classes.card: bg-gray-900 border border-purple-800/50 rounded-lg shadow-lg shadow-purple-900/20 hover:border-purple-600 transition-all duration-200 ease-in-out
classes.primaryButton: bg-purple-600 hover:bg-purple-700 text-white font-bold py-2 px-4 rounded-md transition-all duration-200 ease-in-out shadow-lg shadow-purple-500/30 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-purple-500 focus:ring-offset-2 focus:ring-offset-gray-950
classes.secondaryButton: bg-gray-800 hover:bg-gray-700 text-gray-300 border border-gray-700 py-2 px-4 rounded-md transition-all duration-200 ease-in-out focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-gray-500 focus:ring-offset-2 focus:ring-offset-gray-950
